Facts 1-20.message: Being alone helps you to see the loneliness of others.
People who lose their virginity late have a higher income higher education and a more healthy relationship later in life than those who lose their virginity earlier .
While negotiating with someone leave your hands and palms visible, this is the sign of trustworthiness.

Facts 21-40.message: My brother is the guide of my life.
Sometimes it’s easier to pretend you don’t care than to admit its killing you.
